Test Script Summary: Checks status code 200; content-type JSON; status: ok; timestamp present
Notes: Basic health check

Test Script Summary: Checks status 200; response contains headers object; verifies X-Custom-Header echoed
Notes: Sends X-Custom-Header: PostmanTest

Test Script Summary: Checks 200 and that Set-Cookie header contains demoCookie
Notes: Sets demoCookie in cookie jar

Test Script Summary: Checks 200 and that response cookies contain demoCookie=hello-from-server
Notes: Reads cookies sent by client

Test Script Summary: Checks 200; response has token; saves token to environment variable 'jwtToken'
Notes: Body: {username: testuser, password: password123} -> saves token

Test Script Summary: Checks 200; verifies user info present and matches testuser/student-admin
Notes: Requires header Authorization: Bearer {{jwtToken}}

Test Script Summary: Checks 200 and Set-Cookie header contains sessionId
Notes: Body: {username: testuser, password: password123} -> sets sessionId cookie in jar

Test Script Summary: Checks 200 and returns user info with username cookieUser
Notes: Requires sessionId cookie present

Test Script Summary: Checks 200; response has count and data array; first student fields verified if present
Notes: Public endpoint

Test Script Summary: Checks 200; student has id 1 and required fields
Notes: Public endpoint; replace id as needed

Test Script Summary: Checks 201; response contains student with id; saves createdStudentId to environment
Notes: Requires Authorization: Bearer {{jwtToken}}; Body contains name, age (number), email, isActive (boolean)

Test Script Summary: Checks 200; verifies updated student fields
Notes: Requires Authorization header and createdStudentId variable set

Test Script Summary: Checks 200; verifies partial update (age changed to 23 in collection)
Notes: Requires Authorization header and createdStudentId variable set

Test Script Summary: Checks 200; verifies deleted student has correct id; unsets environment variable createdStudentId
Notes: Requires Authorization header; cleans up createdStudentId

Test Script Summary: Adaptive tests: if 200 then assert user present; if 401 then assert error present; logs response code & cookie value
Notes: If sessionId present returns 200; collection uses pre-request clear to force 401 when intended

Test Script Summary: Checks 200 and logout message present
Notes: Clears session cookie server-side and removes from jar

Test Script Summary: Checks 200 and message present
Notes: Requires Authorization: Bearer {{jwtToken}}

Test Script Summary: Checks 400 and error message present
Notes: Bad request ID validation

Test Script Summary: Checks 404 and error present when student id not found
Notes: Not found case

Request Name: Error Case - Create Student Missing Fields - POST /students
Test Script Summary: Checks 400 and validation error message includes 'Validation failed'
Notes: Requires Authorization header in collection

Request Name: Error Case - Protected JWT without token - GET /students/protected/jwt-only
Test Script Summary: Checks 401 and error for missing Authorization header; expects JSON error
Notes: No Authorization header set in this request

Request Name: Error Case - Protected Cookie without session - GET /students/protected/cookie-only
Pre-request Script: // This variant of the error case has no pre-request clear so it demonstrates current cookie behavior
Test Script Summary: Originally commented-out asserts for 401; logs response and cookie; adaptive test keeps status either 200 or 401
Notes: Example error-case item; collection includes both adaptive and commented tests
